title: Day 56: Jealous Husbands (2022)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike explains how God elevates the dignity of women by providing new laws around husbands accusing their wives of unfaithfulness. Today we read from Numbers 5, Deuteronomy 5, and Psalm 90.
description:
Fr. Mike explains how God elevates the dignity of women by providing new laws around husbands accusing their wives of unfaithfulness. Today we read from Numbers 5, Deuteronomy 5, and Psalm 90. 
For the complete reading plan, visit ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear.
